columns.name: service_name
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service.

columns.name: service_id
columns.description: The ID of the endpoint service.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: The AWS account ID of the service owner.

columns.name: acceptance_required
columns.description: Indicates whether VPC endpoint connection requests to the service must be accepted by the service owner.

columns.name: manages_vpc_endpoints
columns.description: Indicates whether the service manages its VPC endpoints. Management of the service VPC endpoints using the VPC endpoint API is restricted.

columns.name: private_dns_name
columns.description: The private DNS name for the service.

columns.name: private_dns_name_verification_state
columns.description: The verification state of the VPC endpoint service. Consumers of the endpoint service cannot use the private name when the state is not verified.

columns.name: vpc_endpoint_policy_supported
columns.description: Indicates whether the service supports endpoint policies.

columns.name: availability_zones
columns.description: The Availability Zones in which the service is available.

columns.name: base_endpoint_dns_names
columns.description: The DNS names for the service.

columns.name: vpc_endpoint_connections
columns.description: Information about one or more VPC endpoint connections.

columns.name: vpc_endpoint_service_permissions
columns.description: Information about one or more allowed principals.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the service.
